text:
-tyA#ha syOqnaivaina(gm)# suqShadA# suqSEvA# BUqtA&& vi#Satiq naina(gm)# hinasti brahmavAqdinO# vadanti saqhasra(gm)# sahasrataqmyanvEqtI(3) sa#hasrataqmI(gm) saqhasrA(3)mitiq yat prAcI#muth sRuqjEth saqhasra(gm)# sahasrataqmyanvi#yAqt 
tath saqhasra#mapraj~jAqtra(gm) su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM na pra jA#nIyAt praqtIcIqmuth- sRu#jatiq tA(gm) saqhasraqmanu# paqryAva#rtatEq sA pra#jAnaqtI su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamE#tiq yaja#mAna ( ) -maqByuth sRu#jati kShiqprE saqhasraqM pra jA#yata uttaqmA nIqyatE$ prathaqmA dEqvAn ga#cCati || 32
(lOqkAn ga#mayatiq sA - &vi#dvAnth - suqSEvAq mA&& vi#Saq - yaja#mAnaqM - dvAda#Sa ca) (A7)
